title: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout
description: Bug 21834: Coolbar deleting items corrupting layout Build 2002071610021.
OB: Pressing the Delete button results in the first item on the second row being deleted. Additionally, the Launch item is moved to the first row. This behavior corrupts the layout.
EB: Pressing the Delete button should only delete the selected item without affecting the position of the Launch item on the second row. The layout should remain intact.
SR:
1. Open the Coolbar.
2. Navigate to the second row.
3. Press the Delete button.
4. Observe that the first item on the second row is deleted and the Launch item is moved to the first row.
